0: If visiting London make this one of your choices
Whilst our Children slept in reception we went to bed in a dirty room
When we left the next morning we were not asked if we enjoyed the stay and if there were any problems
We had repeated charges made to our credit card over the first couple of days
The beds were not the same W beds as in the US but still very nice
Power outlets were at a premium
Overall I would return again due to the convenience of the location
Only problem with the room is not enough plug sockets one on the bedside table one on the island sink
so you wash up and brush your teeth in the middle of the room
The DJ was blasting the music so loud that the receptionist could not hear us and vice versa
1: After this situation the hotel manager reached out to us and apologized and offered us a round of drinks in the lounge
We entered the lobby which also shares the space with their restaurant and bar and a multitude of disco balls which filled me with joy
Lage in chinatown Location in Chinatown
This hotel is a great location within walking distance of many restaurants and even many of the tourist spots across the city and close to a couple tube stations
Free upgrade suit lovely staff I always have so much fun at the W london
excellent location lovely staff a comfortable stay
The staff always friendly and helpful
Shoutouts to Jackabo and JaLuka who gave us some great recommendations for restaurants and attractions to visit
Service is really good as you expect from W hotels
